name: ITER
description:
ITER was our team first 3D game, used as a project in our master degree.

This version is an old one, at the moment we can't find our final build, we will replace it if we do (problems: the main menu don't exist here, go straight to the gameplay, some assets are missing in the scenes and the game have more bugs than the final version, one of them being the initial existence of color in the world for example, we are sorry about that, we will look forward to change this soon).

Keys:

Move - AWSD

Jump - Spacebar

Look around - Mouse / Shoot sound - Left mouse button

Pause menu - Esc
